title: Rainy night driving in a city street with multiple parked cars and a stop sign.
caption: The red car is driving slowly on a rainy night, approaching a stop sign.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving cautiously on the rainy night, maintaining a safe distance from the parked cars and other vehicles on the road.
